successes.title: The Nifty MiniDrive
successes.description: An easy to use device that allows anyone to quickly and simply increase the available memory in their MacBook computer.

Pledges.description: Thank you ! All backers will recieve our sincere thanks and the option to be added to our list of people who helped us from the start.

EARLY BIRDS: Help get the ball rolling! One Nifty MiniDrive in your choice of color (choose from Classic Silver, Chromatic Red, Hot Pink or Cobalt Blue). FREE SHIPPING to North America and Europe. Add $5 for international shipping

EARLY BIRD PRO: Help get the ball rolling (professionally?)! One Nifty MiniDrive Pro in your choice of color (choose from Classic Silver, Chromatic Red, Hot Pink or Cobalt Blue). FREE SHIPPING to North America and Europe. Add $5 for international shipping
One Nifty MiniDrive Pro in your choice of color (choose from Classic Silver, Chromatic Red, Hot Pink or Cobalt Blue). FREE SHIPPING to North America and Europe. Add $5 for international shipping
One Nifty MiniDrive in your choice of color (choose from Classic Silver, Chromatic Red, Hot Pink or Cobalt Blue). FREE SHIPPING to North America and Europe. Add $5 for international shipping

One MiniDrive: Your choice of 1 Nifty MiniDrive (Air/Pro/Retina) in your choice of color (Classic Silver, Chromatic Red, Hot Pink or Cobalt Blue) - choices collected at end of campaign. Free Shipping to North America and Europe. Add $5 for international shipping.

COMBO PACK: Two Nifty MiniDrives OR Two Nifty MiniDrive Pros OR a combination of one Nifty MiniDrive and one Nifty MiniDrive Pro. (choose from Classic Silver, Chromatic Red, Hot Pink or Cobalt Blue). FREE SHIPPING to North America and Europe. Add $5 for international shipping

THE COMBO: Your choice of 2 Nifty MiniDrives (Air/Pro/Retina) in your choice of color (Classic Silver, Chromatic Red, Hot Pink or Cobalt Blue) - choices collected at end of campaign. Free Shipping to North America and Europe. Add $5 for international shipping.

THE TRINITY: Your choice of 3 Nifty MiniDrives (Air/Pro/Retina) in your choice of color (Classic Silver, Chromatic Red, Hot Pink or Cobalt Blue) - choices collected at end of campaign. Free Shipping to North America and Europe. Add $5 for international shipping.

OFFICE PACK PRO: 5 Nifty MiniDrive Pros in your choice of color (choose from Classic Silver, Chromatic Red, Hot Pink or Cobalt Blue). FREE SHIPPING to North America and Europe. Add $10 for international shipping

OFFICE PACK: 5 Nifty MiniDrives in your choice of color (choose from Classic Silver, Chromatic Red, Hot Pink or Cobalt Blue). FREE SHIPPING to North America and Europe. Add $10 for international shipping

OFFICE COMBO PACK: 5 niftydrives consisting of your choice of combination between Nifty MiniDrives and Nifty MiniDrive Pros (choose from Classic Silver, Chromatic Red, Hot Pink or Cobalt Blue). FREE SHIPPING to North America and Europe. Add $10 for international shipping

THE HANDFUL: Your choice of 5 Nifty MiniDrives (Air/Pro/Retina) in your choice of color (Classic Silver, Chromatic Red, Hot Pink or Cobalt Blue) - choices collected at end of campaign. Free Shipping to North America and Europe. Add $5 for international shipping.

MULTI COMBO PACK: 40 niftydrives consisting of your choice of combination between Nifty MiniDrives and Nifty MiniDrive Pros (choose from Classic Silver, Chromatic Red, Hot Pink or Cobalt Blue). FREE SHIPPING to North America and Europe. Add $20 for international shipping

THE TETRACONTAGON: Your choice of 40 Nifty MiniDrives (Air/Pro/Retina) in your choice of color (Classic Silver, Chromatic Red, Hot Pink or Cobalt Blue) - choices collected at end of campaign. Free Shipping to North America and Europe. Add $5 for international shipping.
